snippet.title: Portal: Alive & Kicking Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/270470/Portal_Alive__Kicking/

Coming real soon!

Portal: Alive & Kicking is a full remake and re-imagining of Valve's Portal. Utilizing the power of Portal 2 and its engine, Alive & Kicking slips you back into the cold test chambers of Aperture Science to retell the original story of Chell and GLaDOS - updated to compensate and complete the vast retcons and aesthetic additions of the sequel.
